description:
When Momoka invites Fuyuki to an abandoned planetarium, he becomes possessed by the spirit of an old projector! Then, Keroro has a single wild hair growing on top of his head, which he cultivates after Fuyuki tells him it`s a "lucky hair."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, Mood of the Starry Sky / Keroro, Little Hair of Luck
桃華 星空の気持ち であります / ケロロ 福毛ちゃん であります
